text: int main ( ) { int n = 0 , r = 0 , i = 0 , j = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n ) { scanf ( "%d" , & r ) ; int a [ MAX ] [ MAX ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= r ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = r ; i > 1 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] [ j ] > a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) { a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; } else { a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } } printf ( "%d" , a [ 1 ] [ 1 ] ) ; n -- ; } }
